title: Lateral 11.2
description: Lateral  11.2 (Fall 2022) Edited by Robert F. Carley, andré m. carrington, Stefanie A. Jones, Eero Laine, Alyson K. Spurgas, and Chris Alen Sula This issue features three regular articles and the first installment of a special section, "Crip Pandemic Life: A Tapestry," which builds on the “Cripistemologies of Crisis” special section, edited by Theodora Danylevich and Aly Patsavas, last year.
